Complete Ripping information:
All but 3 Stages were ripped, rest are relinked
In songs 33075HZ stereo ADPCM was downsampled to 27000Hz stereo ADPCM, and 16538HZ mono ADPCM was downsampled to 13500Hz mono ADPCM

INSTRUCTIONS FOR RIPKIT:

1.Extract from an ISO image all the files from both layers with Apache 2 or 3 into the same folder as the ripkit (you can delete the ISO after this)
2.Run ghwtrip.bat
4.At the end IML2ISO will pop up, select ghwt.iml and click start.
5.Burn the ISO at 4X with DVD Decrypter.
